Posts.Content: May 15, 2011 05:40PM MWS wrote: Christine... I am sorry you are here.... but I have found great comfort here, and only have been here a few days.... my diagnosis was the same as yours. I had a lumpectomy, and then genetic testing... then it was decided my best bet was to have a bilateral mastectomy with reconstruction...I am comfortable in my decsion, and in the support of my drs..... any questions... ask... good luck and know that you are not alone:) Mary
Posts.Title: Just Diagonosed with High Grade DCIS WorkingMom10 mommyrnx2

Posts.Content: Jul 27, 2011 05:41PM MWS wrote: HI THERE!  You are not alone at all... and you are so much stronger than you realize... I am constantly amazed at the amount of strength that all these women on this sight have and continue to have... I come here often to learn and grow, and most of all know that I know I am not alone.... Hang in there and know that you can beat this! Lost of love and hugs!
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed and trying to keep it together Leighsa Joan811
